name: Iona Mind
headline: Software-based mental health support
description:
Iona Mind is building the first fully-digital care pathway for common mental health issues. 

Our products are based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT), one of the most effective evidence-based forms of treatment, which is delivered in a fully automated way using a conversational interface. Unlike other wellbeing apps, our exercises and programs are evidence-based, with over 300 peer reviewed journal papers showing the efficacy of CBT in the treatment of many common mental health conditions.

founders.name: Jonathan Baker, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder/COO @ Simudyne (Techstars, Barclays, SwayVC)
Head of Mathematics GWA
Trinity College, Cambridge

founders.name: Philip Howson, Founder
founders.description: Previously Philip was a founding partner and head of trading technology at XTX Markets which is now one of the world's largest automated (algorithmic) trading firms. Philip retired from XTX Markets in April 2016. Before XTX, Philip worked at GSA Capital (which XTX span out from), Barclays Capital, UBS and Morgan Stanley predominantly on automated trading.

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/8e9a9e39-2a29-427f-a76a-77a162958eaa/hero-website-large.jpg)
## Tailored mental health support for your population
We work with the people you serve to create scalable mental health solutions that are right for them.
[ Request Demo ](https://ionamind.com/</request-demo>)
## One-size-fits-all mental health isn’t working.
We specialise in adapting mental health support to meet the needs of your population. We work directly with them and involve them in the process.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/9fd2a40a-6718-4189-a643-ffe8b77168ac/Group+3243+%281%29.png)
Supporting
Chronic diseases 
Underrepresented groups 
Cancer 
Cardiovascular 
Diabetes 
Disability 
Minorities 
Veterans 
Kidney disease 
Chronic diseases Underrepresented groups  Cancer Cardiovascular  Diabetes Disability  Minorities Veterans Kidney disease Chronic diseases Underrepresented groups Cancer Cardiovascular Diabetes Disability Minorities Veterans Kidney disease 
[ Explore Solutions ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions>)
## Why choose Iona Mind?
  * ####  Market leading approaches 
Iona Mind are the market leaders in low-intensity cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) technologies. Low intensity CBT uses health technologies to enable patients to work at their own pace within their own time. This reduces the demands and costs placed upon providers. There are over 30 systematic reviews and 50 controlled trials demonstrating the effectiveness of low-intensity CBT.
  * ####  24 / 7 Support 
Iona Mind offers 24 / 7 around the clock support to ensure everyone can get help when they need it. The Iona Care Team are easily accessible from inside any of our products so they’re always just a few taps away.
  * ####  Developed with patients 
Iona Mind has a structured and proprietary formula for co-developing products for your population. This ensures accessibility, diversity and inclusion are built in and tested from the beginning. The relevant cultural adaptations also enhance acceptability and usability.


## Our solutions
## Tailored psychological support for your population
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/e1977c2d-11b6-4f1d-9d7b-b5450531768d/Group+3240.jpg)
Offer accessible, acceptable and inclusive support to the people you serve.
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-tailored-support>)
## Behavioral health at scale
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/bd7a2b76-4592-4bc0-9b6c-f4d42585bf5d/Group+3225+%281%29.png)
Manage population health with evidence-based programs designed for your members. 
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-behavioral-health>)
## Mental health support for chronic diseases
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/c10f6847-7b2e-4230-972a-b5bb4b4a791b/Group+3239+%281%29.jpg)
Living with one or more chronic diseases can be stressful. Treatment and survivorship come with their own mental health challenges. Offer support for the psychological side of chronic disease*.
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-chronic>)
## Recognized globally
  * ## For work with the Carbone Cancer Center in Wisconsin
The Iona Mind platform was used to develop a low-intensity cognitive behavioural therapy program specifically designed to support patients undergoing, or who have been treated, for head and neck cancer. The program is fully digital and accessible on patient’s mobile phones, it uses AI-support to personalize the experience and is available 24/7.
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-1-2>)
  * ## For employee benefits work with Unum 
Iona Mind partners with Unum to help them offer benefits that deliver accessible and effective psychological support that fosters a healthier, more engaged workforce.
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-3>)
  * ## For work with the Office for Veterans' affairs
The Iona Mind Platform and development program were used to create a solution built to fit into NHS England's mental health model, providing scalable, low-intensity interventions with immediate digital access and user triage. 
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-1>)
  * ## For work with Aptar Pharma on chronic disease
Iona Mind partnered with Aptar to help support patients with chronic diseases to manage their psychological stress and emotional wellbeing. The partnership brings evidence-based and scalable mental health support to any patient using the Aptar Digital Health platform. 
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-3-1>)
  * ## For work with the Ministry of Health in Saudi Arabia
The Iona Mind platform was used to develop low-intensity CBT interventions for use in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia via the Center for Mental Health Promotion.
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions-1>)


Item 1 of 5
## Our research partners
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/94a5cd40-ad50-4a0b-b400-caf45c47e752/Group+3216.png)
The global leaders in low-intensity cognitive behavioral therapy services
## Iona provides live support in 30+ countries
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60d33d69a570003afd93c38a/ad833f65-58f9-4094-bfa6-3480b83ecd66/Group+3242.jpg)
[ Learn more ](https://ionamind.com/</solutions>)
### **Book a demo** to learn how Iona can support your organization.
**In your demo, you'll learn:**
  * How Iona’s breakthrough technology can support your member’s mental wellbeing.
  * How Iona’s development program can create tailored products for your organization. 
  * How we support you through planning, launching, and driving long-term success.

generated_description:
**Iona Mind** - Pioneering Mental Health Tech Solutions

Iona Mind is an innovative startup focused on providing software-based mental health support, founded in 2019 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21. Located in London, this compact team of five is driven by the mission to create a fully digital care pathway addressing common mental health issues.

### What They Do
At its core, Iona Mind leverages Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), a proven, evidence-based treatment method backed by over 300 peer-reviewed studies. What sets Iona Mind apart from typical wellness apps is its automated delivery of CBT through a conversational interface, making it accessible and engaging for users.

Their offerings include tailored psychological support designed to meet the specific needs of diverse populations, including chronic disease sufferers and underrepresented groups. They’re not just building another app; they’re shaping scalable solutions that adapt to the individual, ensuring a more personalized approach to mental wellbeing.

### Why Iona Mind Stands Out
1. **Market Leadership**: They are at the forefront of low-intensity CBT technologies, which enable users to engage with therapeutic content at their own pace, reducing pressure on both patients and healthcare providers.

2. **24/7 Support**: Iona Mind offers around-the-clock access to their care team via their platform, ensuring immediate assistance for those in need.

3. **Co-Development**: Their products are crafted with direct input from users, ensuring inclusivity and accessibility right from concept to rollout.

### Global Recognition
Iona Mind isn't just a local player; they have established partnerships and initiatives globally, notably working with:
- The Carbone Cancer Center in Wisconsin to tailor CBT for cancer patients.
- Unum to enhance employee benefits with accessible psychological support.
- The Office for Veterans’ Affairs, adapting their platform to fit NHS England’s mental health model.

### Summary
In essence, Iona Mind represents a meaningful shift in mental health care, marrying technology with science to create accessible, efficient, and effective support mechanisms. They address the growing demand for personalized mental health solutions, making strides towards not just treating symptoms but fostering holistic, long-term wellbeing. 

If you’re interested in exploring their services, visit their website at [ionamind.com](https://ionamind.com/).
